fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, break down a target’s defenses. Their Attack and Defense will be set to None for that night and the following day. (Priority 6, so if a target is attacked and sabo’d on the same night, the sabo takes effect before the attack, and if a target attacks someone and is sabo'd on the same night, the attack is nullified).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If a player rolls Saboteur and there is currently no Leader, turn said player into the Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all that would oppose you. (Wins with Institution and Neutral Benign).

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
The Saboteur has sabotaged your defenses! Your Attack and Defense has been set to None.
Your attack and defense has been reset. (Start of the next night)
